title: Statistics Tutorial for Data Science
description: This article is based on Statistics tutorial to learn essential concepts of Statistics, that we need in Data Science. I will try to present the concepts in a fun and interactive way and I encourage you to play with the code to get a better grasp of the concepts.Lets start with importing the libraries and reading the data set
